member.name: T:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmPortal
member.summary: Abstract interface to a service that supports the MeshPortal API calls. Mostly for useful in test code where the ability to switch between a direct and indirect portal connection is desirable.

member.name: M:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmPortal.GetService(System.String)
member.summary: Return a RecryptService object for the named portal service.
member.returns: Recrypt service object for API access to the service.

member.summary: Return a RecryptService object for the named portal service.
member.returns: Recrypt service object for API access to the service.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmPortal.Default
member.summary: Specify the default portal. If not overriden, the default default is to make a remote connection.

member.name: F:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmPortal.ConfirmServiceClient
member.summary: May be set to the default RecryptService by a calling application.

member.summary: Connection to network service using HTTP client.

Application profile for Confirm

member.summary: The public parameter entry for this particular device.

member.summary: The portion of the profile that is encrypted in the mesh.

member.summary: The portion of the profile that is encrypted in the mesh.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmProfile.GetPrivateData
member.summary: Returns the private profile as a block of JSON encoded bytes ready for encryption.

member.summary: Create a new personal profile.

member.summary: Create a new recryption profile with private profiles for the specified device.

The account ID for this entry

member.name: M:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmProfile.AddDevice(Goedel.Mesh.DeviceProfile,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create device specific data.
member.param: If true, create an administration entry

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmProfile.Account
member.summary: The account to which the profile is bound

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmProfile.AuthenticationKeys
member.summary: Authorized Authentication keys for this account. Authentication keys provide authentication without providing non-repudiability. This permits their use in cases where it is desirable to avoid the possibility of contractual binding.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmProfile.SignatureKeys
member.summary: Authorized Signature keys for this account.Signature keys provide non-repudiable authentication of a response. This permits their use in cases where it is desirable to provide the possibility of contractual binding.

member.name: T:Goedel.Confirm.ConfirmResponse
member.summary: Base class for all response messages. Contains only the status code and status description fields. A service MAY return either the response message specified for that transaction or any parent of that message. Thus the RecryptResponse message MAY be returned in response to any request.

member.name: T:Goedel.Confirm.AccountEntry
member.summary: Represents the collection of data associated with an account. This structure is not used in the protocol itself and does not appear in the on-the-wire format. It is included here so that it can be used as a reference point for describing the semantics of the protocol transaction. It is possible that this record format may prove of use in specifying archive and interchange protocols.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.AccountEntry.ResponderAccount
member.summary: The Responder account the request is directed to.

member.summary: List of BrokerIDs of pending requests

member.summary: List of BrokerIDs of responses

member.summary: List of expired requests, now archived.

member.name: T:Goedel.Confirm.StatusRequest
member.summary: Reports the status or of an Enquire transaction.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.StatusRequest.Cancel
member.summary: If true, the broker is abandoning the request and it should no longer be returned to the user as an active pending request. This flag would typically be set true on the last polling attempt made before the Enquirer abandonds the request. It is therefore entirely valid for a broker to return a Response value if the Cancel flag is true.

member.name: P:Goedel.Confirm.StatusRequest.BrokerID
member.summary: The unique identifier for the transaction generated by the broker and returned in the corresponding Enquire transaction.
